structure.unit: B MEDICAL IMAGING, RADIATION THERAPY, AND RELATED OCCUPATIONS

law.catch_line: Penalties to be determined by board.
law.text: Any person who fails to comply with any provisions of this chapter, any administrative regulations promulgated under this chapter, or any valid order of the board shall be fined a reasonable amount as determined by the board through the promulgation of administrative regulations. Each day of violation or noncompliance shall constitute a separate offense.
law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 19, effective July 12, 2012.
